attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give families with both parents working  more help. This should include financial help with child care, dentist fees and council tax. This should also be more govenment schemes offering help with re-training or updating work skills.

Cases where families genuinely need benifits to survive should addressed but those who choose not to work and raise children should not reap the benifits living extravagant and easy, tax payer funded lifestyles
